 The Arts and Science Federation of Associations is the largest faculty association of Concordia University, representing over 20,000 undergraduate Arts and Science students. ASFA is composed by  7  Executives elected every academic year,  33  Member Association Councillors  and  5  Independent Councillors.  
   Concordia University is located on Kanien’kehá:ka (Mohwak) traditional territory. 
   
   Contact Information Downtown: 2070 Mackay Street, Montreal, QC, H3G 2J1 
 Office Hours: Mon - Thu, 9am - 5pm / Fri, 9am - 3:30pm 
 Phone: 514-848-2424 ext. 7966
